definition: (phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
Li Na (1982-), Chinese tennis player, first Asian player to win a Grand Slam singles title (2011 French Open women's singles)
Nana (name)/Nana (1880 novel by Émile Zola)/Nana (Japanese manga series)
Nana (name)/Nana (1880 novel by Émile Zola)/Nana (Japanese manga series)
Yekaterina or Ekaterina (name)/Catherine the Great or Catherine the Second (1684-1727), Empress of Russia

sentences.english: Oh, this is my wife Lena.
sentences.chinese: 哦，对了，这是我的妻子蕾娜。

sentences.english: Intense, coconut and vanilla, with a hint of sultana, lemon and peat.
sentences.chinese: 激烈，椰子和香草，并暗示苏丹娜，柠檬和泥炭。

sentences.english: I can't come into Hogsmeade at all, Angelina wants a full day's training.
sentences.chinese: 我去不了霍格莫德，安吉利娜要训练一整天。

sentences.english: Magdalena who at least can come home and become Nenny.
sentences.chinese: 玛格达蕾娜回到家里可以叫蕾妮。

sentences.english: The Misurina lake with the famous "Drei Zinnen" (three columns).
sentences.chinese: 密苏里娜湖和著名的三柱山。

sentences.english: Jakob thinks that Adrienne doesn’t know I stole the jewels.
sentences.chinese: 雅克布认为阿德里安娜不知道我偷了珠宝。

sentences.english: Saldana also confirmed that shooting will begin early next year.
sentences.chinese: 索尔达娜还说续集将于明年初开拍。

sentences.english: A La Niña is essentially the opposite of an El Niño.
sentences.chinese: 拉尼娜本质上就是个相反的厄尔尼诺。

sentences.english: Let not nemesis catch me by the swift ships.
sentences.chinese: 不要让报应女神娜美西斯用快捷的船舰捉拿我。

sentences.english: How did you approach creating the voice for Queen Karina?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么着手创造卡里娜女王的声音的？

sentences.english: Auspicious Sarah with na, go looking for tile made, o said na to seduce and repairing.
sentences.chinese: 吉雅莎拉着娜诺去找瓦立阿，说娜诺勾引撒修。
即使是40吨重的安通娜12型货机也一样。

sentences.english: So there is no question of guest wanting to cancel their room reservations with Laguna.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，游客会考虑取消赴拉古娜酒店的订单。

sentences.english: Georgiana opened her eyes and looked into the mirror her husband held.
sentences.chinese: 乔治娜睁开眼睛，在丈夫举着的镜子里看着自己。

sentences.english: He suggested Georgina would more likely put people off visiting her shop.
sentences.chinese: 他指出乔治娜此举更可能让人们远离她的商店。

sentences.english: Silvana tightened her grasp on her son.
sentences.chinese: 西尔瓦娜抓紧她的儿子。

definition: see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
used in the transliteration of people's names
Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
